solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean detectCapitalUse(String word) {--newline--        int cnt = 0;--newline--        for(char c: word.toCharArray()) if('Z' - c >= 0) cnt++;--newline--        return ((cnt==0 || cnt==word.length()) || (cnt==1 && 'Z' - word.charAt(0)>=0));--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
